评论详情: I ordered a Medium but it fit like a small or extra small. The sleeves were short and tight unlike the baggy fit the picture shows. The material is very soft and colors didn’t quite match
The sweater ripped down the side the first time it was worn. Extremely low quality
I expected it to be over sized. It was more fitted, but the sleeves were so short, they were like quarter sleeves.
Returned this sweater after my daughter tried it on.  The sleeves were super short on her.

This is a review for Color A Sweater, the blue/green one :o)  I’m 5’5”, 105lbs, and androgynous for reference. I bought a large, but it fits like an extra small. The torso is very cropped, like, up to my belly button/way above my hips. The sleeves are pretty baggy compared to the torso, and are also pretty short—fitting like a medium. The color is pretty true to the photo though!! It’s pretty soft, but you can also just tell the material is a bit cheap, but that’s expected.. It’s not a heavy sweater though. If you wear it in the winter, you’d want to layer up. But if you wear it during the autumn or spring, then you’d be warm enough.
Not at all baggy or oversized. Ordered an XL I'm 5'8" fits like a small
Returned. Was shown standard length in photo but came as a very short, practically cropped length sweater. Also very scratchy, rough woven material. Poor quality all around.

It’s not at all oversized, it’s tight and fits to the skin. Even if it’s oversized or whatever type of body size you would have, it won’t have that type of oversized look in the producers picture Other than that it’s cute and comfy and came without any rips, so you can buy it for a small child.
My grand loves it!
My daughter wanted this “grandpa” sweater. It’s very thick and even when following care instructions, the sweater shrunk.

评论概述: Not as oversized as I hoped
评论详情: Sweater is beautiful and soft, but runs small. I usually wear a medium but based on other reviews sized way up to an XL. Sweater fits like a medium sweater that’s slightly oversized.
It runs smaller than labeled. I'll have to order a larger size next time. I gave the one I originally ordered to my younger sister and it fits well. She says it's warm and very comfy
Granddaughter liked it
Love the design, but the sleeves are really short for some reason even at an XL. Would not recommend unless you're a child/teen.

This sweater is ok, but not that good. Definitely worth like $12 on SHEIN, but I wouldn’t buy it for $30. It looks like the photo, but it feels pretty bad. It’s thick, but itchy and not cute knit. From afar it’s fine, but up close it shows how cheaply made it is. Also, the sizing for the body is accurate but the sleeves are weirdly narrow for how wide the body is. Looking back on the product image, the sleeves are narrow for the body, so I guess it’s not necessarily a misleading image. But it was a little disappointing. All around not bad, but you could find something better.

This style of sweater is supposed to be loose and oversized, however the XL was tight in the arms and across the hips.  It had to be given to someone else, who normally wears a small.  Disappointing Christmas gift.
The sweater is half the size of whats pictured. Not oversized AT ALL. I ordered a XL and it’s maybe a Med and more like a cropped fit. Super cute if it had been oversized like it was supposed to be.

This sweater is cute and it's comfy, but it's not oversized.  I am 5' and typically a size S.  I saw reviews saying that it was shorter than pictured, but it was right.  It's still cute and I'm still gonna wear it, but I was hoping for it to be baggier

Sweater is super cute and comfy. Only thing is is it fits like a normal sweater on the arms and only a bit baggy on the body (so not flattering on the form). If you are not petite, this will more than likely be actually baggy on you.

评论概述: Horrible don’t buy this waste of money
评论详情: The material is not the same as the photo, I regret buying so badly! Worst mistake!
Definitely wasn’t oversized, arms were super short as was the body of the sweater. Closer to a crop top.
Exactly what our daughter wanted
The sleeve length and length of shirt itself were too short. Looked nothing like the picture. Took ridiculously long to get it shipped. Not true to size. Complete scam don't waste your money.
My daughter loves it

评论概述: Soft mad seems true to size and colors
评论详情: Cute sweater it’s soft, not itchy and true to size and colors
kinda itchy and the sleeves were weirdly short but i like it
Too small not as pictured. Mo
Sizing is way off. Ordered a large and what came was closer to a small. Was able to return fairly easy though.
Cute, good material...but won't fit me, will fit the dog though..I ordered a XL

Short was not true to size or picture. It was not oversized at all - went up in size even for an extra grunge/baggy look and a large fit and looked smaller than an XXS….  If you want the grunge baggy look - DO NOT BUY. If you want a tight sweater go for it - if still go up in a size or two… neck was tight and higher then the picture. Bottom of the shirt also was a tight band vs the loose hanging the picture shows :/:/  I would NOT recommend. The sweater was not even close to true based on the picture and reviews I saw.
I was so excited to get an oversized grandpa sweater. But the sleeves were so short! I had to return it. Please make the sleeves longer!
